alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:08PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Heavy Rainfall and Rising River Levels Again This Week... Heavy rainfall across Brooks Range and North Slope will result in rising water levels on streams and rivers. Rainfall totals around 1.0 inch are expected Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday afternoon from the Colville River near Umiat east to the Dalton Highway. Recent heavy rainfall last weekend has saturated soils in this area and water levels are already running higher than normal. Water levels will rise again Wednesday and Thursday and may approach bankfull in some low lying areas, including along the Kuparuk and Sagavanirktok Rivers. People in this area encouraged to monitor water levels this week.

area.areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Northeastern Brooks Range
